name: Parkinson Game
description:
The game challenges players to knock out and finish a game of 'Parkinson', a 3-D parkour game developed by Tommaso Carra.
Tommaso Carra, who created the game, also made The Incredible Hulk (1999) and The Asteroid Factory (1962), both novelistic, running games in which players take on diverse and increasingly dangerous tasks in order to score points. 'Parkinson Game' is the result of a collaborative collaboration between Tommaso Carra and his friend, film and television producer, Igor Barich. It is similar to The Incredible Hulk movie and television series where players act as a team to beat their opponents, while working as a team to knock out as many opponents as possible before time runs out. The game features timing-based difficulties, which made it easy for them to get the team working together on time. Parkinson Game is already available to pre-order on Outhouse Media, but the release date has not yet been announced. Outhouse Media Discuss This Post
